The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:18 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LUCAS GUTTENTAG ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
